Title: Wonkyconn - quality metrics and insights into your fMRI connectomes!
Leaders: Hao-Ting Wang @htwangtw Clara El Khantour @claraElk Pierre Bergeret @pbergeret12
Project Description: Evaluating the residual motion and analytic insights on the fMRI connectome and visualising reports. The project is based on the code from SIMEXP/fmriprep-denoise-benchmark and the publication by Wang et al. (2024).
Goals for Brainhack Montreal:
• Clean up documentation
  • Improve figures and reports
  • Code quality
Things to do after the project is submit: • [ ] Short summary of your project pitch to present during the hackathon.
